author: Jorge Alonso
title: Redskins QB Kirk Cousins Angrily Berates And Shoves Volunteer Referee At Charity Flag Football Game
text:
We all know that Kirk Cousins is a fiery guy but he may have gone a bit too far when he shoved a volunteer ref at a charity flag football game today. 
Watch as Cousins loses his mind because the ref didnâ€™t quickly place the ball. 
H/T Deadspin
